snippet.title: The Life of a Magical Circle - Free Re-release Trailer
snippet.description:
The Life of a Magical Circle is a simple but subversive evade-and-collect game. Take control of a circular creature and see if you can figure out your purpose with only a little help from a mysterious narrator.

Now available for free!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2408890/The_Life_of_a_Magical_Circle/

itch.io: https://solideo.itch.io/the-life-of-a-magical-circle

GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/the_life_of_a_magical_circle
